mapper.insert: insert into performance values ( performance_seq.nextval, #{ memberId }, #{ categoryCode }, #{ locationCode }, #{ perTitle }, #{ perDirector }, #{ perActor }, #{ perAddress }, #{ perContent }, #{ perImgOriginalFileName }, #{ perImgRenamedFileName }, #{ detailImgOriginalFileName }, #{ detailImgRenamedFileName }, #{ perRating }, default, default, default )
